north of house.description: You are at the north side of the white house. There is a path here leading north.

path.description: You are on a winding path that leads through the forest. A large tree with low branches stands here.

forest1.description: You are in a forest. Ancient trees tower above you.

forest2.description: You are in a dense forest. The trees seem to close in around you.

mountains.description: You are in a mountainous area. The peaks loom ominously above you.

canyon_view.description: You are at Canyon View. Below you can see the magnificent Aragain Falls.

clearing.description: You are in a clearing. The forest opens up here, allowing sunlight to stream through.

house.description: You are at the white house. It's an old, weathered building with a boarded front door.

living room.description: You are in the living room of the white house. A beautiful oriental rug lies in the center. A wooden door leads east into the kitchen, while stairs lead up to the attic.

actions.move rug: You discover a trap door under the rug leading to the cellar!

east of house.description: You are behind the white house. A path leads into the forest to the east. There is a small window here which is slightly ajar.

actions.open: The window is already slightly open.

kitchen.description: You are in the kitchen of the white house. A table seems to have been used recently for the preparation of food. A window is open to the east, and passages lead west and down.

attic.description: This is the attic. The only exit is a stairway leading down.

south of house.description: You are at the south side of the white house.

west of house.description: You are at the west side of the white house. There is a small mailbox here.

actions.open mailbox: Opening the mailbox reveals a leaflet.

cellar.description: You are in a dark and damp cellar with a narrow passageway leading north, and a crawlway to the south. A rickety wooden staircase leads up.

east of chasm.description: You are on the east edge of a chasm, the bottom of which cannot be seen. A narrow passage leads north, and the path you are on continues to the east. The path from below ends here, blocked by a massive fallen boulder.

actions.jump: In a moment of insanity, you jump into the chasm. You hit the bottom... eventually.

gallery.description: This appears to be an art gallery. Most of the paintings have been stolen by vandals through the years. The vandals have shown good taste, as the remaining paintings are of exceptionally poor quality. The gallery continues to the north.

studio.description: This appears to be the studio of a painter, but it has been neglected for years. Paint drippings cover everything, and several early attempts at painting have been left on easels to gather dust. A dark and narrow chimney leads up. A doorway leads south.

troll room.description: This is a small room with passages to the east and south. Bloodstains and deep scratches mar the walls. A menacing troll brandishing a bloody axe blocks all passages out of the room.

actions.attack troll with sword: The troll, disarmed by your skilled swordplay, takes flight. The troll, defeated, disappears into the gloom.
actions.throw garlic at troll: The troll catches the garlic and runs away in disgust. The troll, defeated, disappears into the gloom.

maze1.description: This is part of a maze of twisty little passages, all alike.

maze2.description: This is part of a maze of twisty little passages, all alike.

maze3.description: This is part of a maze of twisty little passages, all alike.

maze4.description: This is part of a maze of twisty little passages, all alike.

maze5.description: This is part of a maze of twisty little passages, all alike.

maze6.description: This is part of a maze of twisty little passages, all alike.

maze7.description: This is part of a maze of twisty little passages, all alike.

maze8.description: This is part of a maze of twisty little passages, all alike.

maze9.description: This is part of a maze of twisty little passages, all alike.

maze10.description: This is part of a maze of twisty little passages, all alike.

maze11.description: This is part of a maze of twisty little passages, all alike.

maze12.description: This is part of a maze of twisty little passages, all alike.

maze13.description: This is part of a maze of twisty little passages, all alike.

maze14.description: This is part of a maze of twisty little passages, all alike.

maze15.description: This is part of a maze of twisty little passages, all alike.

maze16.description: This is part of a maze of twisty little passages, all alike.

maze17.description: This is part of a maze of twisty little passages, all alike.

maze18.description: This is part of a maze of twisty little passages, all alike.

maze19.description: This is part of a maze of twisty little passages, all alike.

cyclops room.description: This is a room with an enormous cyclops. The air smells of burning torches.

treasure room.description: This is the treasure room. Jewels and gold surround you!

east west passage.description: This is a long east-west passage. There is a tight crawl to the north.

round room.description: This is a circular room with passages in almost all directions.

gas room.description: This is a gas-filled room. A strong chemical smell permeates the air.

smelly room.description: This room has a peculiar odor, different from the gas room.

mine entrance.description: You are at the entrance to an old mine. A shaft leads down into darkness.

shaft room.description: You are in a room with a mine shaft. A basket on a chain hangs here.

basket room.description: You are in a room with a basket mechanism. The shaft continues down.

drafty room.description: There is a cold draft coming from somewhere in this room.

timber room.description: This room is filled with old mining timbers.

ladder bottom.description: You are at the bottom of a ladder. Coal dust fills the air.

ladder.description: You are on a ladder in the mine shaft.

deep canyon.description: You are on the west edge of a deep canyon. Passages lead north and south, and the canyon is to the east. The walls of the canyon come together from below and there is no way down. The rushing sound is quite loud here.

reservoir south.description: You are in a long room on the south shore of a large reservoir. A low dam forms the north wall of the room. Dark passages lead south and west.

reservoir.description: You are on the reservoir. The water is chilly, but swimmable. The reservoir extends north and south. Beaches lie to the north and south.

actions.swim: You swim in the chilly water.

reservoir north.description: You are in a long room on the north shore of a large reservoir. A low dam forms the south wall of the room. A western dam blocks the flow from this room. Dark passages lead north and east.

atlantis room.description: This is an ancient room, long under water but now high and dry. The room is tall and circular, with a high domed roof. A large bronze bell hangs from the center of the room. A passage leads south.

actions.ring bell: The bell tolls deeply. The sound echoes throughout the cavern.

mirror room.description: You are in a large square room with tall ceilings. Huge mirrors line the walls, making it difficult to tell which are doors and which are mirrors.

cold passage.description: This is a cold and damp corridor where a long east-west passageway intersects a north-south one.

engravings cave.description: You have entered a low cave with passages leading northwest and east. There are old engravings on the walls here.

actions.read engravings: The engravings were incised in the living rock of the cave wall by an unknown hand. They depict, in symbolic form, the beliefs of the ancient peoples of Zork. Skillfully interwoven with the bas reliefs are excerpts illustrating the major religious tenets of that time.

dome room.description: You are at the periphery of a large dome, which forms the ceiling of another room below. Protecting you from a precipitous drop is a wooden railing which circles the dome.

actions.jump: In a moment of insanity, you jump from the edge of the dome. You hit the floor below with a sickening crash.

torch room.description: This is a large room with a prominent doorway leading to a down staircase. Above you is a large dome. A passage leads north.

temple.description: This is the temple. A passage leads south and massive wooden doors lead west. The doors are locked.

actions.pray: A voice whispers: 'The doors are now unlocked.'

altar.description: This is the altar. A huge mirror fills the north wall. A small window can be seen in the east wall.

actions.ring bell: A deep resonant sound fills the room.
actions.read book:
The book is in Latin, but you can make out a few phrases:
'...with these objects of power...
...the bell of truth...
...the book of knowledge...
...and the candles of light...
shall the wise reveal the secret way...'

loud room.description: This is a large room with a ceiling which cannot be detected from the ground. There is a narrow passage from east to west and a stone stairway leading upward. The room is deafeningly loud with an undetermined rushing sound. The sound seems to reverberate from all of the walls, making it difficult even to think.

itemDescriptions.leaflet:
Welcome to ZORK!

ZORK is a game of adventure, danger, and low cunning. In it you will explore some of the most amazing territory ever seen by mortals.

No computer should be without one!
itemDescriptions.egg: The egg is covered in intricate jeweled patterns. You can't seem to find a way to open it.
itemDescriptions.sack: Opening the sack reveals a lunch and a clove of garlic.
itemDescriptions.axe: This is a bloody axe, evidence of its owner's violent tendencies.
itemDescriptions.platinum bar: This is a large and very heavy platinum bar.
itemDescriptions.bell: This is a beautiful brass bell.
itemDescriptions.torch: This is an old torch, still burning brightly.
itemDescriptions.rope: This is a sturdy rope, suitable for climbing.
itemDescriptions.book: This appears to be a prayer book of some sort.

take.description: Adds an item to your inventory.

use.description: Uses an item in your inventory.

inventory.description: Lists all items in your inventory.

unlock.description: Unlocks a locked door or object.

drop.description: Drops an item from your inventory.

examine.description: Examines an item or object closely.

look.description: Describes the current room and its items.

open.description: Opens a container, door, or window.

enter.description: Enters a building, passage, or window.

exit.description: Exits through a door or window.

ring.description: Ring a bell or similar object.

light.description: Light a candle, torch, or similar object.
